nodes.text: The D-22 speeder bike, also known as the "screamer", was produced by the Corellian Engineering Corporation and considered a high-performance Corellian machine. It had a maximum altitude of 35 meters and a close sensor range. The asking price of a D-22 was around 4,500 credits.
The D-22 was the preferred vehicle of the Corellian swoop gangs which used them in swoop races. A swoop gang known as the Black Seraphs used it for criminal purposes.
